title: Quantitative Relationship for Cars
question_text: Which option below does NOT describe a relationship between two quantitative variables for cars?

choices.text: The size of a gas tank of a car and the number of miles it can be driven on a tank of gas.
The miles per gallon a car gets and the number of miles it can be driven on a tank of gas.
The miles per gallon a car gets and the type of car that it is.
The size of the gas tank of a car and the number of times the tank is filled per month.
The number of times a gas tank is filled per month and the miles driven by the car.
